definition: to tangle up/to twist together/to wind
to turn/to twist/to wring/to sprain/to swing one's hips
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)

sentences.english: Carefully pull back the access line. The kink should be in the bottom of the burr hole.
sentences.chinese: 小心的往後拉入顱線，扭結應處於單孔的底端。

sentences.english: The number of twisting collagenous fibrils closely correlated with the degree of fibrous degeneration.
sentences.chinese: 斑塊狀扭結的數量與膠原原纖維的退變程度成正比。

sentences.english: When you use the wiring laying underground pipe, wire in the pipes should be joint and kink.
sentences.chinese: 佈線時要用暗管敷設，導線在管內不應有接頭和扭結。
